remarks: If the empty set is not contained in the base set of a magma, the restriction of the addition operation to (the Cartesian square of) the base set is the functionalization of it.  (Contributed by AV, 28-Jan-2020.)

plusfreseq.2 $e |- .+ = ( +g ` M ) $.
plusfreseq.3 $e |- .+^ = ( +f ` M ) $.
mgmplusfreseq $p |- ( ( M e. Mgm /\ (/) e/ B ) -> ( .+ |` ( B X. B ) ) = .+^ ) $.
